SmartFieldSpec.Name: Current Sponsorship Extension Status
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Current status from sponsorship extension record.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Mark Sellers
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_CHILD_CURRENT_SPONEX_STATUS ( @ASOF datetime ) as begin -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date ;with cteCurrentSponsorshipStatus as (select soc.ID, (case when (c.[DESCRIPTION] is not null and c.[DESCRIPTION] = 'Sponsored') then 'Sponsored' else case when ((c.[DESCRIPTION] is not null and c.[DESCRIPTION] in ('Formerly Sponsored', 'Formerly Prospect Sponsored', 'Prospect Sponsored')) or c.[DESCRIPTION] is null) then 'Not Sponsored' else '' end end) as 'CURRENTSTATUS' from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc left outer join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION sponex on sponex.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = soc.ID left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE c on c.ID = sponex.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID where (sponex.ID is not null and ISCURRENT = 1) or sponex.ID is null ) select ID, CURRENTSTATUS from cteCurrentSponsorshipStatus --group by SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID,CURRENTSTATUS;
end
